alert.note: Alert for Calcasieu (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 11 at 8:40PM CDT until May 16 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana... Calcasieu River Near Salt Water Barrier Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Calcasieu River Near Salt Water Barrier. * WHEN...Until late Tuesday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - There is no current observed data. - Forecast...The river will oscillate around flood stage with a maximum value of 4.2 feet Saturday evening. - Flood stage is 4.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Calcasieu River Salt Water Barrie 4.0 MSG unknown 4.1 4.2 4.2 &&
